name: Mwendano Web version logic game
description: This is web version of Mwendano logic game. Previous games were special only for Windows, Linux and J2ME mobile device.  see  https://yphsoft.itch.io/mwendano-logic-game.  So now you can even play with browser without downloading. Browser must support HTML5. These are new versions of Chrome, Opera and Firefox but now there more new browsers that support HTML5. Even some browsers in smartphones work nicely with HTML5 games though their displays are too small for game like this but you can still zoom. So the object of the game is to move all rings to required targets that are circles. Quantity of rings must be two or more movable rings in order to move. You can get more info about game from  http://bitl.y/tehelimu3  or from link above, of downloadable versions.
